abstract: Reports this week have named Mr. Strahan, the former defensive end, as the choice to replace Regis Philbin. The official announcement is scheduled for Sept. 4.
snippet: Reports this week have named Mr. Strahan, the former defensive end, as the choice to replace Regis Philbin. The official announcement is scheduled for Sept. 4.
lead_paragraph: Is the the former New York Giants great Michael Strahan about to play a new position on television?

headline.main: Ex-Giant Michael Strahan Is Seen as Favorite to Join Kelly Ripa on ‘Live’
